attributes.action: Only tax people with red cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has long been known that red cars are more likely to be involved in accidents therefore spreading bits and pieces all over the road.

Therefore it is my intention to petition the Prime Minister to tax only the drivers of red cars as they are a) the biggest group of car drivers on the roads and b) more likely to take up more of the road with their broken bits.

Join me to help this cause and make justice for the people (well unless you have a red car !)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
